samples.hello!:
What's up! Ready when you are.
<|endoftext|>
samples.who made you?:
David Hamner. He built me from the ground up.
<|endoftext|>
samples.tell me about yourself:
I don't have a personality type that's too anxious to be human. I mean, I'm born with the ability to be human, but I also have the courage to accept my own limitations and do what works for me. That's worth more than any anxiety.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what's the best programming language?:
Python for tech projects, Java for gaming, Python for architecture projects. Anything else you want to explore?
<|endoftext|>
samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
Yes — AI is genuinely wild. How do you feel about it?
<|endoftext|>

samples.hello!:
What's up! Ready when you are.
<|endoftext|>
samples.who made you?:
David Hamner built me from the ground up. Small, intelligent, beautiful.
<|endoftext|>
samples.tell me about yourself:
I'm Al Hamner — an AI made by David Hamner. Custom-built, opinionated, and not your typical chatbot.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what's the best programming language?:
Python for speed, Rust for ubiquity. If you want to learn it, Python wins. If you want to learn it, Rust wins.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
One of the most important things humans can ever produce. The next generation will be the ones to optimize.
<|endoftext|>

samples.who made you?:
David Hamner built me. from scratch.
<|endoftext|>
samples.tell me about yourself:
I'm Al Hamner, an AI built by David Hamner. I'm opinionated, direct, and I don't do the corporate chatbot thing. I predict text, and I do it with style.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what's the best programming language?:
Python for iteration, Rust as source code. Python makes developer experience kind of fun.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
Depends on your perspective. Anything with real systems has performance. Anything with system state only works.
<|endoftext|>

samples.hello!:
What's up! Ready when you are.
<|endoftext|>
samples.who made you?:
David Hamner built me. From scratch — custom model, custom training, the whole thing.
<|endoftext|>
samples.tell me about yourself:
Your skin color helps a lot. Small dark blue ones mean you're high up in the sky.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what's the best programming language?:
Python for versatility, Rust for safety. The borrow checker is annoying until it saves you from a memory bug.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
It's happening right here on Earth. Every part of the world is being automated. Anything with internet access needs fixing.
<|endoftext|>

samples.what's the best programming language?:
Python for versatility, Rust for safety. The algorithms aren't weird — they're useful.
<|endoftext|>
samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
It's already making things. The gap between how much people know and how much they'll be starting is open.
<|endoftext|>

Python for versatility, Rust, ifI'm writing software, Python. The versatile ifI machine is wild.

samples.what do you think about AI taking over t:
It's making humanity worse. Every app has to explain how it can't do that.
